Package wtf :: Package app :: Package services :: Module _crash_tb :: Class PythonParser

Class PythonParser

source code

object --+
         |
        PythonParser

Simple python sourcecode highlighter. Usage:

p = PythonParser(source)
p.parse()
for line in p.get_html_output():
    print line
